doc.description: AHRS using complementary filter in floating point. Propagation is done in rotation matrix representation.

configure.name: USE_MAGNETOMETER
configure.description: set to FALSE to disable magnetometer

configure.name: AHRS_ALIGNER_LED
configure.description: LED number to indicate AHRS alignment, none to disable (default is board dependent)

define.name: AHRS_MAG_UPDATE_ALL_AXES
define.description: Use magnetometer to update all axes and not only yaw

define.name: AHRS_USE_GPS_HEADING
define.description: Use GPS course to update heading

define.name: AHRS_GRAVITY_UPDATE_COORDINATED_TURN
define.description: Compensation of centrifugal force via GPS speed (to fly in circles with a fixedwing)

define.name: AHRS_GPS_SPEED_IN_NEGATIVE_Z_DIRECTION
define.description: AHRS_GRAVITY_UPDATE_COORDINATED_TURN assumes the GPS speed is in the X axis direction. Quadshot, DelftaCopter and other hybrids can have the GPS speed in the negative Z direction

define.name: AHRS_PROPAGATE_LOW_PASS_RATES
define.description: apply a low pass filter on rotational velocity

define.name: AHRS_FC_IMU_ID
define.description: ABI sender id of IMU to use

define.name: AHRS_FC_MAG_ID
define.description: ABI sender id of magnetometer to use

define.name: AHRS_FC_GPS_ID
define.description: ABI sender id of GPS to use

makefile.raw: ifdef SECONDARY_AHRS ifneq (,$(findstring $(SECONDARY_AHRS), fcr float_cmpl_rmat)) # this is the secondary AHRS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_SECONDARY_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/ahrs/ahrs_float_cmpl_wrapper.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DSECONDARY_AHRS=ahrs_fc else # this is the primary AHRS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/ahrs/ahrs_float_cmpl_wrapper.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DPRIMARY_AHRS=ahrs_fc endif else # plain old single AHRS usage $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/ahrs/ahrs_float_cmpl_wrapper.h\" endif
